  3. Cilantro Lime Rice

Cilantro Lime Rice

By: Instant Brands Culinary Team

Course
Side Dish
Difficulty
Easy
Duration
15-30 min
Diet
Vegetarian
Cooking Technique
Pressure Cook, Rice
Keywords
15-30 min, cilantro, easy, Instant Brands Culinary Team, limes, pressure cook, rice, side dish, vegetarian, water
Ingredients
  • 3 cups rice
  • 3 cups Water
  • 3 limes
  • 1/4 cup cilantro
Instructions
  • Pour rice and water into your Instant Pot.
  • Use the Rice Function and Pressure Cook.
  • Do a Quick Release. Juice the limes into the rice, use as much or as little to your taste. Sprinkle cilantro and stir the rice until thoroughly mixed.
  • Enjoy!
